Question
========

Four people enter a room: two women and two men. They then sit down randomly in a row. What is the probability that the two middle seats will be occupied by the two men?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2
* 1/10
* 1/4
* 1/6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2: Incorrect
* 1/10: Incorrect
* 1/4: Incorrect
* 1/6: Correct
